attributes.title: American phone was hacked
attributes.review: Hello. I downloaded this app because at this current date in time, it is a fact that Donald Trump is President of the USA. As an American citizen, i wanted to hear how Trump advertised himself to the people. I was very troubled to see that they wanted my information and my app kept crashing. It was extremely concerning and I was very scared. I noticed an extremely subtle and faded flashing dot on my screen after i downloaded the app. After searching up all of the details on google, I REALIZED ID BEEN HACKED! I downloaded a program of sorts to tell me for sure if I had a virus and they said someone had hacked me and gathered my information. Please donâ€™t let this app steal anyone elseâ€™s info
